thread.title: Rep. Reichert defends refusal to meet with constituents
thread.title_full: Rep. Reichert defends refusal to meet with constituents

author: ZOSHA MILLMAN, SEATTLEPI.COM STAFF
title: Rep. Reichert defends refusal to meet with constituents
text:
Close Image 1 of 24 Protesters gather outside Rep. Dave Reichert's (R-WA) office in Issaquah Thursday, Feb. 23, 2017. Some of Reichert's constituents in the 8th District say he is avoiding them by skipping Town Hall meetings and refusing phone calls. less Protesters gather outside Rep. Reichert defends refusal to meet with constituents 1 / 24 Back to Gallery 
Reichert did not allay concerns of the thousand people who tuned in during his KCTS 9 interview, though he sought to make clear that he does not agree with President Trump on many things, like the immigration ban or cutting funding to the National Endowment of the Arts. 
He also said that he will not support a healthcare bill that does not include replacement â€“ which, according to the congressman, is coming in the next couple of weeks. Related Stories
